title: Step-by-step guide to AI readiness and maturity
description: AI readiness is about understanding the critical role of data, people and processes to enable AI-driven strategic differentiation.

title: Modi pitches India as global artificial intelligence hub at AI summit
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has pitched India as a major hub for artificial intelligence, built at home and used worldwide. On Thursday, Modi told an AI summit in New Delhi that India wants to “design and develop in India” and deliver to humanity. The summit was also addressed some world leaders and tech CEOs, including French President Emmanuel Macron, Google's Sundar Pichai and U.N. Secretary-General António Guterres. Guterres called for a $3 billion global AI fund to help poorer countries build skills, data access, and computing. India highlights its digital ID and payments systems as a model for low-cost AI. But it still trails in building top AI models. The summit also faced glitches and Bill Gates’s withdrawal.
